statements: DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE stats LIKE '%wins%' AND achievements IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM stats WHERE player_id = 5 AND wins > 10;
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name = 'Win Championship';
DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 100 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE wins < 10 AND losses > 5;
DELETE FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 123 AND matches_played > 100;
DELETE FROM user_achievements WHERE player_id = (SELECT id FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe') AND achievement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stats WHERE player_id = 5 AND stat_name = 'Defeats';
DELETE FROM stats WHERE player_id = 100 AND stat_name = 'Health';
